Title: Fruit Juice
Description: Fruit Juice is a Metro UI inspired HTML5 template. With Fruit Juice you can easily create a website to promote your Windows Phone app!
HomeWiki:
Project Description

Fruit Juice is a Metro UI inspired HTML5 template. With Fruit Juice you can easily create a website to promote your Windows Phone app!

Please, let me know if you use it! :)
Preview: http://www.salgentile.eu/fruitjuice/

Features

  • QRCode integrated in the App Tile;
  • Responsive layout;
  • Live tiles support;
  • Share buttons with counter;
  • Screenshot slider;
  • Free and Open Source!

Credits

  • Responsive GS http://responsive.gs/ by Denis Leblanc from Studio Snapsize http://snapsize.com/;
  • jQuery Cycle http://jquery.malsup.com/cycle/ by Mike Alsup;
  • Sharrre http://sharrre.com/ by Julien Hany http://hany.fr/;
  • MetroJs Live Tiles http://www.drewgreenwell.com/projects/metrojs by Drew Greenwell http://www.drewgreenwell.com/.
